column4: Hi all! Some body has the same phenomenon like me? Ubuntu 6.06 WLAN Card detectet all right, Card findes the ESSID it is the right WeP Key but i can get network connection?
is there a better tool the then networkadmin of gnome?
hoelk this helped me through my probs https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/NetworkManager?highlight=%28manager%29%7C%28network%29
